### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

3.6.54

Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc.

Microsoft Edge

Mobile

https://www.commondreams.org/

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter, Fanboy's Anti-Facebook List, Legitimate URL Shortener

comment.body:
It's not a good idea to block cookie consents at bank sites!
In many cases, this will cause issues that aren't apparent until users have actually logged in.

In this case however, the problems ARE obvious..
There are many more sites affected than the ones mentioned by the OP.
**Easylist Cookie List** and **Fanboy's Annoyance List** already blocks the consents at those sites, which therefore becomes frozen with missing scrollbars!

Full report here: https://github.com/easylist/easylist/issues/15030/

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
The rule is not correct, but you can block it in different ways.
Using our private DNS - block any domain via settings.
Using our User rules - for instance, add this rule `||reliablestore.co.za^$all`.

comment.body:
> Как это сделать?

В настройках программы - Антибаннер - увидите список фильтров - добавляется вручную фильтр раздражителей. Затем проверяете обновление в программе, в браузере нужно будет очистить его данные, включая кэш, а затем открыть сайт.

>  И что такое adguardextra ?

Более подробно можно почитать [здесь](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra#adguard-extra).

comment.body:
Like I pointed out, the issues are caused by **Easylist Cookie List** and **Fanboy's Annoyance List** (see link to my report in my previous post).
But of course, by adding that blocking rule ( https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/commit/1266fbbf48cc78ca55529e05f11bb61071671a2a ) to **AdGuard Annoyances filter**, you've now also made sure that there could be potential issues caused by that filter too.
IMO, cookie consents shouldn't be blocked for bank sites, considering how important they are to the people that use them!
I don't have an account with any of those sites, so I can't test for breakage..
However, @DandelionSprout does!

issue.title: Get rid of legacy Extended CSS syntax

labels.name: Infrastructure
labels.description: Related to the repository infrastructure

issue.body:
### Steps:
1. Check if the site is existing
2. If the site is dead - remove all rules for this site
3. If working - check for applied `[-ext-` rules and remove unused rules or convert to the actual syntax, if a rule applied.

This task is only about extcss, so the detailed check is optional (you can create a separate list with missed ads and process it in another task).

comment.body:
This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

[Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
[Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

Naprawione, aktualizacja filtrów powinna być dostępna za około 1-2 godziny.

>Jakim filtrem można to wyeliminować? Bo to jest naprawdę denerwujące? Dodam jeszcze, że to nie występuje tylko na tej stronie, ale na wielu innych również.

Niestety nie ma listy filtrów albo ogólnej reguły, która zablokowałaby to na wszystkich stronach.

comment.body:
So, the rules works as expected, that's fine. Now remove or disable (add `!` at the beginnin of each rule) them, turn AdGuard Base on (all other filters should be disabled), update it, open the filtering log and then the site. When you do it, open the filtering log, select the tab which related to opened site and try to find this rule `##.banner-ad-pos`. You can just put it in the search. Then send a screenshot of the filtering log here. In the end, you should get something like this. It means that the rule applied correctly.
Screenshot: ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/33488229/220104927-9225e9c9-2b8d-483f-b4ae-a29766293dbe.png)

Other ad blocker

1.46.1rc0

Missed ads or ad leftovers

Firefox

Desktop

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard German filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, EasyList, EasyList Germany, EasyPrivacy

_No response_

- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;

- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

1.46.1rc0

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.pornohirsch.net/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard German filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, EasyList, EasyList Germany, EasyPrivacy

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. https://github.com/easylist/easylist/issues/14954#issuecomment-1427779014
 https://github.com/easylist/easylistgermany/issues/250#issuecomment-1428437004
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/81081

A reason why to hide at least the bottom big ad placeholder is already provided: "annoying, taking space", thus it should be fixed, otherwise a counter-argumentation why not to fix it should be provided, "no because no"/ "ignoring" is insufficient explanation.


3. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/72945564/218305818-e29c9bb9-7f0d-4e5e-ad2d-d148356e8a2a.png)

</details>

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
It seems that the app loads Kakao player as a web iframe, so please use a web browser instead of Daum Cafe app.

<details><sumamry>한국어 - Korean</summary>

앱이 카카오 플레이어를 웹 iframe으로 로드하는 것 같아 다음 카페 앱 대신에 웹 브라우저를 사용해주세요.

</details>

issue.title: youtube.com: URL tracking

labels.name: T: Tracker
labels.description: Collecting analytics and tracking users

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

.

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

`https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pAZWv8QQ8Co`

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard URL Tracking filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

YouTube's description links have tracking parameters.

Example:
`https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pAZWv8QQ8Co`

In the description:
`https://www.youtube.com/redirect?event=video_description&redir_token=[...]&q=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.paypal.me%2Fpaysyfr&v=pAZWv8QQ8Co`

`event`, `redir_token`, `q` being the destination link and `v` being the video id.

Proposed filters for AdGuard URL Tracking Protection:
```adb
||youtube.com/redirect?$removeparam=event
||youtube.com/redirect?$removeparam=redir_token
||youtube.com/redirect?$removeparam=v
```

Result link:
`https://www.youtube.com/redirect?q=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.paypal.me%2Fpaysyfr`

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition
